field.name: description
field.value: Attached is a patch that adds implementation and tests for GuidValidator. Optionally, it can accept/reject Guid.Empty.

comment.author: petemounce
comment.text: Updated patch; compilation failed because I hadn't realised XML docs were set to be required. Patch now also includes TimeSpan validator + attribute.

comment.author: hammett
comment.text: Applied. Thanks for the patch and for sticking with our coding standards :-)

comment.author: hammett
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
